cmp: 匕 (an ancient type of spoon, dagger/ladle)
mng: finger, to point at or to, to indicate or refer to, to depend on, to count on, (of hair) to stand on end

exm.mng: to appoint, to assign, to indicate clearly and with certainty, designated
to guide, to give directions, to direct, to coach, guidance, tuition
to point out mistakes or weak points for correction, to comment, criticism
(numerical, statistical) index, (math.) exponent, index, exponential (function, growth)
to guide, to show, to point (the way), directions, guidance, guidelines
to point out, to indicate, to instruct, directives, instructions
target, quota, index, indicator, sign, signpost, (computing) pointer
